name: Universe
headline: Design and build any kind of website. On your iPhone or iPad.
description:
Our mission is to empower everyone to build the internet. Universe is a magical new way to build websites –– it’s the first website builder designed for phones. Our app makes it easy for anyone to make a great looking website and start selling online in minutes from your iPhone, iPad, and Mac. And we make it as fun as playing with Legos! 

Give it a try: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1211437633

Explore sites made on Universe: https://onuniverse.com/explore

We are a remote-first 20+ person company with people all over the US. We were YC W18 and have raised $17.2MM in funding from Google Ventures, General Catalyst, Javelin Venture Partners, Box Group, and more top investors.

We value individual agency and ownership –– which guides our product design and our company’s culture. While other companies offer lots of perks, we prioritize your freedom: work from anywhere, in the way you’re at your best. We believe that an individual’s capacity for growth is far larger than most understand, and we’ve designed an environment to support rapid, continuous learning. Ideas here come from everyone, initiative is respected, and quality matters. We are here to build something special and enduring.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Universe**

**What We Do**: Universe is a no-code website builder that lets anyone design and launch websites using just their iPhone or iPad. Think of it as building with Legos, but for the web. Whether you need an online store, a blog, a portfolio, or any type of webpage, you can create something beautiful in minutes—no coding skills required. The app is designed to be intuitive and versatile, allowing users to drag and drop elements as they build.

**Mission**: Our mission is clear: empower everyone to build the internet. We believe that creating a website should be fun, fast, and accessible to all.

**Background**:
- **Founded**: 2015 as part of Y Combinator's Winter 2018 batch.
- **Funding**: Universe has successfully raised $17.2 million from prominent investors, including Google Ventures and General Catalyst.
- **Team**: We operate as a remote-first company, with a dynamic team of over 25 employees spread across the United States.

**Culture and Values**: At Universe, we foster an environment of individual agency and ownership. We steer clear of typical corporate perks and instead offer the freedom to work from anywhere—because we believe that creativity flourishes when people feel empowered. Every team member’s ideas are valued here, and we focus on rapid learning and improvement to build something meaningful and lasting.

**Recognitions**: Our dedication to quality and design has not gone unnoticed. Universe was recognized with the 2023 Apple Design Award, and our app boasts over 7,000 five-star reviews, highlighting the satisfaction of our users. More than one million websites have been built with Universe, showcasing its growing footprint in the digital landscape.

**Key Features**:
- **User-Friendly Editing**: With our drag-and-drop interface, users can see real-time changes while building their site, making it easy to visualize the end product.
- **E-Commerce Capabilities**: Start selling products or digital downloads effortlessly with features like sell blocks and analytics to track performance.
- **Flexible Plans**: Current offerings include Free, Base, Pro, and Complete plans, ensuring there’s an option for various budgets and needs.

**Explore & Get Started**: If you're interested in building your own site or want to see what others have created, check out our platform at [onuniverse.com](http://onuniverse.com). For a firsthand experience, you can download our app from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1211437633).

**Join Us**: We're always on the lookout for passionate individuals who want to contribute to this exciting journey. If you resonate with our mission and values, consider joining our team!

In short, Universe is not just about creating websites; it's about empowering people to express themselves and thrive in the online space. So why wait? Dive in and start building!
